Title: Directs the public service commission to modify the objectives of the Clean Energy Fund for reductions of air pollution, and relating to the value of distributed energy resources
Summary: Directs the public service commission to modify the objectives of the Clean Energy Fund for reductions of air pollution including oxides of nitrogen, sulfur dioxide and particulate matter; relates to the value of distributed energy resources.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the public service commission to modify the objectives of the Clean Energy Fund for reductions of air pollution including oxides of nitrogen, sulfur dioxide and particulate matter, and relating to the value of distributed energy resources
